title: Kapil Sharma BREAKS Silence About 'Insulting' Atlee: ‘Watch And Decide By Yourself…’ - News18
summary:
Kapil Sharma BREAKS Silence About 'Insulting' Atlee: ‘Watch And Decide By Yourself…’

Date: December 17, 2024, Source: News18

Kapil Sharma has responded to accusations of insulting filmmaker Atlee during an episode of 'The Great Indian Kapil Show'. He urged viewers to watch the segment and form their own opinions.

  • Kapil was criticized for a question related to Atlee's appearance during the show.
  • After backlash, Kapil denied the accusations and asked not to spread hate.
  • Atlee's response emphasized judging by character rather than appearance.
  • The controversy arose from a post on social media that misinterpreted Kapil's intentions.

“Dear sir, can you pls explain me where n when I talked about looks in this video? pls don’t spread hate on social media thank you. (guys watch n decide by yourself, don’t follow anybody’s tweet like a sheep).” — Kapil Sharma

This incident highlights the sensitivity around comments made in the entertainment industry and how they can be perceived on social media.
newTitle: Kapil Sharma Addresses Controversy Over Insulting Atlee

Shatrughan Slams Mukesh Khanna Over Sonakshi-Ramayan Row: 'Who Appointed Him Guardian Of Hindu?' | Viral - News18
summary:
Shatrughan Sinha Criticizes Mukesh Khanna for Attacks on Daughter Sonakshi Regarding Ramayan

Date: December 17, 2024

Source: Viral

In a recent conflict, Shatrughan Sinha vocally opposed Mukesh Khanna's repeated criticisms of his daughter Sonakshi over her memory lapse regarding the Ramayan during a game show.

  • Sonakshi Sinha confronted Mukesh Khanna after he remarked on her forgetting a detail about Ramayan on Kaun Banega Crorepati.
  • Shatrughan Sinha questioned Mukesh Khanna's authority to judge and labeled him 'guardian of the Hindu religion'.
  • Shatrughan emphasized that forgetting a question about the Ramayan does not undermine Sonakshi's identity as a Hindu.
“Not answering a question on the Ramayan doesn’t disqualify Sonakshi from being a good Hindu.” - Shatrughan Sinha

Shatrughan Sinha expressed pride in his children, affirming Sonakshi's accomplishments and dismissing the need for validation through religious trivia.
newTitle: Shatrughan Sinha Criticizes Mukesh Khanna for Attacks on Daughter Sonakshi Regarding Ramayan

title: Aamir Khan Should Leave it to SS Rajamouli - M9
summary:
Aamir Khan Should Leave the Mahabharata Adaptation to SS Rajamouli

Publication Date: December 2024

Source: M9 News

Aamir Khan has expressed a desire to adapt the culturally significant epic Mahabharata, but has concerns about the potential pitfalls of such a project. He suggests that SS Rajamouli, known for his successes with films like Baahubali, might be better suited for the task.

  • Aamir Khan has long wanted to adapt the Mahabharata.
  • He fears failing to do justice to its cultural significance.
  • SS Rajamouli is considered the ideal director for such a project.
  • Khan acknowledges the current political climate adds complexity to the adaptation.
  • His existing commitments raise questions about his involvement in the project.
“It’s a huge responsibility because, as Indians, it’s in our blood.” – Aamir Khan

Aamir Khan should reconsider taking on the Mahabharata adaptation and allow SS Rajamouli to lead, as he is better equipped for the challenging task.
newTitle: Aamir Khan Should Leave the Mahabharata Adaptation to SS Rajamouli

title: Kapil Sharma reacts to backlash against his alleged ‘racist jibes’ at Atlee on The Great Indian Kapil Show - Hindustan Times
summary:
Kapil Sharma Reacts to Backlash Against His Alleged ‘Racist Jibes’ at Atlee on The Great Indian Kapil Show

Date: Dec 17, 2024 | Source: Hindustan Times

The controversy began when filmmaker Atlee appeared on The Great Indian Kapil Show to promote his upcoming movie, Baby John. Kapil Sharma faced backlash for joking about Atlee's appearance, prompting him to request viewers to watch the entire episode before forming opinions.

  • Atlee participated in the show alongside actors Varun Dhawan, Keerthy Suresh, and Wamiqa Gabbi.
  • Kapil asked Atlee a question regarding meeting a star for the first time, which led to criticism for being insensitive.
  • Atlee emphasized the importance of judging people by their talent rather than appearance, which many found inappropriate in context.
  • Kapil publicly addressed the criticism on social media, urging people not to misinterpret his remarks.
  • Responses on social media were mixed, with some fans defending Kapil while others condemned his comment as body shaming and insensitive.
“Dear sir, can you pls explain me where n when I talked about looks in this video? pls don’t spread hate on social media.” - Kapil Sharma

The incident generated significant discussion online, raising concerns about humor's boundaries in relation to race and appearance.
newTitle: Kapil Sharma Responds to Criticism Over Alleged Racist Remarks towards Atlee

title: Pushpa 2 box office report: Allu Arjun's action drama beats RRR, KGF 2 to become 3rd highest-grossing Indian film - Hindustan Times
summary:
Pushpa 2 box office report: Allu Arjun's action drama beats RRR, KGF 2 to become 3rd highest-grossing Indian film

Date: Dec 17, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

The action drama, Pushpa 2 The Rule, has achieved significant success at the box office, surpassing RRR and KGF 2 to secure its place as the third highest-grossing Indian film in just 12 days of release.

  • Pushpa 2 has grossed ₹930 crore at the Indian box office.
  • The film is aiming to beat Baahubali 2's collection of ₹1790 crore.
  • On its 13th day, it collected ₹3.66 crore, with projections of reaching ₹1000 crore soon.
  • It surpassed ₹500 crores in its Hindi version, becoming the fastest film to hit this mark.
  • Despite a recent incident involving Allu Arjun's arrest, the film's collections increased by 70% following the event.
"Pushpa 2 is now eyeing to surpass Baahubali 2 and Dangal to potentially become the second highest-grossing Indian film ever."

In conclusion, Pushpa 2's unprecedented box office success reflects its widespread appeal and the strength of its star power, indicating a promising future as it aims for higher milestones.
newTitle: Pushpa 2 Box Office Breaks Records with Allu Arjun's Action Drama

title: I paid to pee in my pants at Bryan Adams Mumbai concert: Diabetic man lambasts Zomato CEO - The Tribune India
Top Highest Grossing Indian Films Worldwide: Allu Arjun starrer Pushpa 2 overtakes RRR for Third - PINKVILLA
summary:
Pushpa 2 Surpasses RRR as the Third Highest-Grossing Indian Film Worldwide

Updated on: Dec 17, 2024 | Source: Pinkvilla

Pushpa 2 has claimed the title of the third highest-grossing Indian film worldwide, surpassing RRR with a total gross of approximately Rs. 1259 crore.

  • Pushpa 2 generated Rs. 33 crore approximately on its 2nd Monday, bringing its worldwide box office total to Rs. 1259 crore.
  • The film's domestic gross is Rs. 1039.50 crore, while the overseas total is Rs. 219.50 crore.
  • Pushpa 2 is now the second highest-grossing film in India, yet remains outside the top fifteen in overseas grosses.
  • Despite its success, it is predicted that Pushpa 2 is unlikely to surpass the Rs. 1744 crore gross of Baahubali 2.
  • The current highest-grossing Indian films are: Dangal (1910.00 cr.), Baahubali: The Conclusion (1744.00 cr.), and Pushpa: The Rule (1259.00 cr.).
“Pushpa 2 is favourite to become the highest-grossing film in India, beating Baahubali 2.”

In conclusion, Pushpa 2’s record-setting performance reflects the film's strong appeal and the competitive landscape of Indian cinema.
newTitle: Pushpa 2 Surpasses RRR as the Third Highest-Grossing Indian Film Worldwide

title: Why SC restrained TM Krishna from claiming award named after MS Subbulakshmi. 'Added fuel to fire' - ThePrint
summary:
Supreme Court Prevents T.M. Krishna from Claiming M.S. Subbulakshmi Award

Publication Date: Date Not Specified Source: The Print

Well-known Carnatic musician T.M. Krishna has been restrained by the Supreme Court from claiming the Sangita Kalanidhi M.S. Subbulakshmi Award, awarded by the Madras Music Academy, following an appeal by Subbulakshmi’s grandson.

  • The Supreme Court issued a notice regarding the award conferred upon Krishna.
  • Subbulakshmi’s grandson, V. Shrinivasan, challenged the Madras High Court's decision that allowed the award to be given.
  • The Supreme Court indicated that Krishna's comments about Subbulakshmi were disrespectful and necessary to address.
  • Krishna faces accusations of making derogatory remarks about Subbulakshmi in his writings.
“This is a sensitive and important issue.” - Supreme Court Bench

The controversy highlights a broader conflict regarding the recognition and memory of M.S. Subbulakshmi in the field of Carnatic music.
newTitle: Supreme Court Prevents T.M. Krishna from Claiming M.S. Subbulakshmi Award

title: Mahira Khan thought her ‘career is over’ after photos with Ranbir Kapoor went viral, she was banned: ‘I was crying daily’ - The Indian Express
summary:
Mahira Khan Reflects on Career Challenges After Viral Photos with Ranbir Kapoor

Date: December 2024 | Source: The Indian Express

Mahira Khan has opened up about the emotional toll that viral photos of her with Bollywood actor Ranbir Kapoor took on her career and mental health, describing a time when she feared her career was over.

  • Mahira discussed the complexities of being a single mother and her ban from performing in India.
  • She shared how the viral smoking photos affected her mental health, leaving her extremely distressed.
  • Despite the challenges, Mahira focused on making personal choices for her and her child.
  • In 2017, the leaked photos of them sparked widespread speculation.
“When the photos came out there was an article called ‘The Little White Dress’ that was published in BBC ... I was crying daily, it affected my professional and personal life.”

Mahira's resilience shone through as she chose to prioritize her personal well-being during a critical time in her life.
newTitle: Mahira Khan Reflects on Career Challenges After Viral Photos with Ranbir Kapoor

summary:
Mrunal Thakur replaces Shruti Haasan in Adivi Sesh’s Dacoit

The Telugu film Dacoit sees Mrunal Thakur stepping into the lead role, previously held by Shruti Haasan. Directed by Shaniel Deo, this film unfolds as a gripping love story intertwined with daring robberies.

  • Adivi Sesh celebrates his birthday while gearing up for the film's release.
  • Touched by intense emotions, the film's promotional posters highlight a troubled relationship.
  • The storyline features former lovers forced into a series of robberies that change their lives.
  • Produced by Supriya Yarlagadda, the film is shot in both Hindi and Telugu.
  • Current filming locations include Hyderabad and planned shoots in Maharashtra.
This ambitious project is aimed at captivating audiences with its thrilling narrative and character dynamics.

Overall, Dacoit promises to be an exciting addition to Mrunal Thakur's and Adivi Sesh's film journeys, highlighting the complexities of love and crime.

title: Kangana Ranaut reacts to Kapoor family meeting PM Modi; says she has also requested an audience with him - Hindustan Times
summary:
Kangana Ranaut Comments on Kapoor Family's Meeting with PM Modi

Date: Dec 17, 2024 Source: HT Entertainment Desk

Kangana Ranaut has expressed her views regarding the recent meeting between the Kapoor family and Prime Minister Narendra Modi, highlighting the need for guidance in the film industry.

  • Kangana believes the film industry is vulnerable and underutilized as a soft power.
  • She criticized the lack of guidance in the industry, making its members susceptible to negative influences.
  • Kangana has requested an audience with PM Modi, emphasizing the importance of recognition for the film industry.
  • Up next, she stars in the self-directed film Emergency, portraying Indira Gandhi, set to release in 2025.
“They need to be a part of mainstream industries... we make so many films and generate so much revenue.”

Kangana's remarks reflect a broader conversation about the film industry's role in society and its relationship with political figures.
newTitle: Kangana Ranaut Comments on Kapoor Family's Meeting with PM Modi

When Zakir Hussain revealed why his mom didn't want him to play the tabla: Would get food as payment; mom - TOI Etimes
summary:
When Zakir Hussain revealed why his mom didn't want him to play the tabla: Would get food as payment; mom wanted me to have a secure future

Publication Date & Source: Times of India

Zakir Hussain, the renowned tabla maestro, recently shared the reasons behind his mother's initial reluctance to let him pursue a career in music.

  1. Zakir Hussain's mother was concerned about the financial stability of a career in music.
  2. She wanted him to have a more secure and stable future.
  3. Zakir revealed that he often received food as payment for his performances, which reinforced his mother's concerns.
"I used to get food as a form of payment, and my mother wanted me to have a secure future."

Zakir Hussain's journey highlights the challenges faced by many musicians in securing a stable income and the importance of family support in pursuing one's passion.
newTitle: Zakir Hussain on Why His Mom Didn't Want Him to Play the Tabla: Receiving Food as Payment, Seeking a Secure Future

title: Sonakshi Sinha CALLS OUT Mukesh Khanna for “Distasteful statements” over Shatrughan Sinha’s upbringing: “Stop bringing up the same incident time and again to be back in the news” - Bollywood Hungama
summary:
Sonakshi Sinha Criticizes Mukesh Khanna Over Comments about Her Father

Date: December 2024 | Source: Bollywood Hungama

Sonakshi Sinha strongly criticized actor Mukesh Khanna for blaming her father, Shatrughan Sinha, for her lack of knowledge about the Ramayana, following comments he made about a past incident on a quiz show.

  • Sonakshi expressed disappointment at Khanna's comments on her KBC performance from 2019.
  • She accused Khanna of seeking publicity by dragging up the same incident repeatedly.
  • Sonakshi defended her father's teachings and stressed the importance of forgiveness from the Ramayana.
  • Mukesh Khanna had previously stated it was Shatrughan's responsibility to educate his children.
“Stop bringing up the same incident time and again to be back in the news.” - Sonakshi Sinha

In summary, Sonakshi Sinha's response highlights her frustration with public figures using personal family matters for attention, while also promoting values of respect and remembrance of lessons from the Ramayana.
newTitle: Sonakshi Sinha Criticizes Mukesh Khanna Over Comments about Her Father

Bollywood actor Raj Kundra has broken his silence on the pornography case against him, claiming to be a scapegoat. He asserts that he has never been involved in pornographic content production.

  • Kundra recently summoned by the Enforcement Directorate in a pornography investigation.

title: What Nita Ambani wrote for luxury Bengaluru store after saree shopping: ‘Wonderful to be…’ - Hindustan Times
summary:
Nita Ambani's Visit to Luxury Saree Store in Bengaluru

Date: Dec 17, 2024 Source: Hindustan Times

Nita Ambani, the chairperson of the Reliance Foundation, was spotted shopping for sarees at The House of Angadi, a luxury textile store in Bengaluru. Her visit garnered attention as videos showed her greeting fans before entering the store.

  • Nita Ambani wore a dark blue co-ord set and was seen greeting people as she entered the store.
  • The House of Angadi specializes in handloom sarees and has a history of 600 years.
  • The store gained fame when Deepika Padukone wore one of its sarees for her wedding.
  • Nita Ambani left a note in the visitor’s book expressing her appreciation, stating: “Wonderful to be here and experience our Indian heritage.”
“Thank you Mrs Nita Ambani for your warmth and patronage,” the official Instagram account of The House of Angadi stated.

Nita Ambani’s visit highlights the rich textile heritage of India and brings attention to traditional weaves in contemporary fashion.
newTitle: Nita Ambani's Visit to Luxury Saree Store in Bengaluru

summary:
Ram Charan to Perform Malavisarjanam in Dallas

Date: December 21, 2024   Source: M9 News

Telugu star Ram Charan is set to perform MalaVisarjanam at a temple in Dallas, coinciding with his arrival for the pre-release event of his movie Game Changer.

  • Game Changer's pre-release event will be the first of its kind for a top-tier Telugu star in the U.S.
  • The event will take place at the Curtis Culwell Center in Dallas, attracting a large audience.
  • Ram Charan will complete his rituals before appearing at the event.
  • He will return to India after the Dallas event for further engagements, including a significant event in Andhra Pradesh.
  • Other notable attendees will include S. J. Suryah and event anchor Suma.
“Ram Charan, who is currently observing Ayyappa Deeksha, will complete his MalaVisarjanam at a temple in Dallas.”
